body.para:
Modified: tools/workben Tag: cws_srx644_draw3 urltest.cxx Log: #106489# Even in strict mode, accept file URLs without an authority (as
generated by Java, for example); removed distracting output.
(In the diff below, changes in quantity of whitespace are not shown.)
